description: US President Donald Trump has threatened Apple with a minimum 25 percent tariff on iPhones if production isn't moved to the US. This escalates pressure on the tech giant, whose extensive iPhone supply chains have long been concentrated in China. Trump's demand highlights a significant challenge for Apple to onshore manufacturing for its popular devices.
title: Trump Threatens 25 Percent Tariffs on Apple If iPhones Not Made in US

description: Acer Swift Neo has been launched in India. The laptop is powered by an Intel Core Ultra 5 CPU with Intel Arc Graphics, coupled with up to 32GB of LPDDR5 RAM. It comes with a diamond-cut touchpad, fingerprint reader and a backlit keyboard with a dedicated Copilot key. It is claimed to have a hinge that can be opened and closed with a single hand.
title: Acer Swift Neo WIth Intel Core Ultra 5, Up to 32GB RAM Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei reportedly said that artificial intelligence (AI) models hallucinate less than humans. As per the report, the statement was made by the CEO at the company’s inaugural Code With Claude event on Thursday. During the event, the San Francisco-based AI firm released two new Claude 4 models, as well as multiple new capabilities, including improved memory and tool use.
title: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei Says AI Models Hallucinate Less Than Humans: Report

description: Elden Ring, FromSoftware’s award-winning action-RPG phenomenon, is getting a live-action film adaptation. Publisher Bandai Namco and boutique film production firm A24 will collaborate on the adaptation, with British director Alex Garland helming the project. Garland has previously directed acclaimed films like Ex Machina and Annihilation.
title: Elden Ring Film Adaptation in the Works at A24 With Alex Garland Set to Direct

description: Vijay Sales has announced its Apple Days Sale in India with an array of discounts on the latest iPhone 16 and iPhone 15 models. The discount sale, which will begin on May 24, brings discounted prices for new iPad models, Apple Watches and AirPods as well. The new MacBook Air models with M4 and M2 chips are also confirmed to see price cuts during the sale. The electronic retail chain has partnered with different lenders to offer payment discounts. The Apple Days Sale will end on June 1.
title: iPhone 16 Pro Max, iPhone 15, MacBook Air (M4) and More Get Discounts During Vijay Sales Apple Days Sale

description: Some of the largest banks in the US are exploring whether to team up to issue a joint stablecoin. JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America, Citigroup, Wells Fargo and other large commercial banks are reportedly part of the discussions.
title: Some US Banks Explore Venturing into Crypto with Joint Stablecoin: Report

description: The UK government has instructed crypto firms to collect user details including transaction data under the Crypto Asset Reporting Framework (CARF). The UK officials have said that crypto companies found in violation of these laws can invite penalties of up to GBP 300 (roughly Rs. 35,000).
title: UK Government Updates Crypto Reporting Guidelines, Mandates Collection of Crypto Transaction Data

description: Google’s artificial intelligence (AI)-powered search experience, AI Mode, has received a critical statement from the News/Media Alliance. On Wednesday, the US-based non-profit trade association issued an official statement criticising AI Mode, and called it “the definition of theft.” This came just a day after the Mountain View-based tech giant announced the expansion of AI Mode to all users in the US at its annual Google I/O event.
title: News Media Alliance Issues Statement on Google’s AI Mode, Calls It ‘Definition of Theft’

description: Noise Buds F1 true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds were launched in India on Friday. The new earphones from the domestic brand come in four distinct colour options and are equipped with 11mm drivers. The Noise Buds F1 have an IPX5-rated build for dust and water resistance and offer Bluetooth 5.3 for connectivity. The Buds F1 have quad mics, and offer an environmental noise cancellation (ENC) feature for calls.
title: Noise Buds F1 TWS Earbuds With IPX5 Rating, Up to 50-Hour Total Playback Time Launched in India

description: Apple is reportedly set to expand its physical retail presence in India, two years after it launched its inaugural Indian retail stores in Mumbai and Delhi in 2023. Apple CEO Tim Cook earlier this year announced plans for four additional Apple Stores across the country. While the tech giant prepares for this expansion, further details on locations and timelines remain unconfirmed.
title: Apple Stores Said to Be Opened in Mumbai and Bengaluru as Apple Eyes Retail Expansion

description: Honor Pad 10 has been launched in select global markets. The tablet is powered by an octa-core Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset coupled with 8GB of RAM. It is backed by a 10,100mAh battery and is equipped with several AI-backed features. The latest Honor tablet comes with an 8-megapixel rear camera alongside an 8-megapixel front sensor. It features six speakers with Honor's Spatial Audio support and a 12.1-inch 2.5K LCD screen.
title: Honor Pad 10 With Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC, 10,100mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Indian developer Underdogs Studio has revealed the gameplay for Mukti, its narrative-driven adventure game in development for PC and PS5. The game is set in mid 2000s-India and tasks players with exploring a museum and discovering clues about the past.
title: Indian Developer Underdogs Studios Reveals Gameplay for Mukti, Narrative Title Coming to PS5 and PC

description: Lava Bold N1 and Lava Bold N1 Pro will be available for purchase next month in India. Although Lava is yet to formally announce the launch date, e-commerce website Amazon India has teased the sale date and specifications of the new Bold series smartphones. They are confirmed to come with Unisoc chipsets and 5,000mAh batteries. The Lava Bold N1 is listed with a dual rear camera unit, while the Lava Bold N1 Pro is seen with a triple rear camera setup.
title: Lava Bold N1, Lava Bold N1 Pro India Launch Teased; Pricing, Specifications Revealed

description: Samsung’s next line-up of foldables is now set to include a new form factor, one that folds out from a smartphone to a full-sized tablet. Earlier and existing models open up to a book-style device that resembles a tablet, but isn’t wide enough to be considered one. Dubbed the Galaxy G Fold, a tipster has now shared information about the foldable’s launch timeline, price and availability.
title: Samsung Tri-Fold Smartphone Price Tipped to Exceed $3,000; Launch Timeline Leaked

description: Embark on this adventure-packed journey where two estranged siblings, portrayed by John Krasinski and Natalie Portman, collectively take on an adventure to find the ultimate fountain of youth. They will have to collect historical clues to reach the fountain to obtain immortality. Will they ever reach there? Know what’s in their journey only on Apple TV+. Streaming now.
title: Fountain of Youth Now Streaming on Apple TV+: What You Need to Know About American Adventure Movie

description: HSBC has launched a new tokenised deposit service for Hong Kong-based corporate clients. Singapore-based fintech firm Ant International was the first corporate to use this service that supports real time payments between HSBC Hong Kong wallets throughout the day.
title: HSBC Launches Blockchain-Based Tokenised Deposit Service in Hong Kong

description: Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G was introduced in select global markets earlier this week. The company has now announced the India launch date of the handset. It also revealed the availability details, design, colour options and some key features of the upcoming Indian variant. The GT 30 Pro is teased to come with customisable RGB LED light panels and shoulder triggers for gaming.
title: Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G India Launch Set for June 3; Colour Options, Key Features Revealed

description: Mohanlal’s L2: Empuraan, directed by Prithviraj Sukumaran, is now premiering on JioHotstar in Hindi. A gripping sequel to Lucifer, the film explores political conspiracies and vengeance, grossed Rs. 80 crores on opening day, and continues to spark debate with its bold themes.
title: L2: Empuraan OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Mohanlal’s Action-Packed Movie Online?

description: Embark on the journey of Tommy Norris, portrayed by Billy Bob Thornton, as Landman, where he tries his modern-day game of fortune to get his company on top during the fuel boom. The story is intense, and the twists and turns make each scene worth watching. Streaming Now only on JioHotstar.
title: Landman Season 1 Now Available on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know About American Political Drama Series

description: Oppo A5x 5G was launched in India on Friday. The handset is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor, paired with up to 4GB of RAM and up to 128GB of onboard storage. It sports a 120Hz LCD screen with a 1,000nits peak brightness. As per the company, the Oppo A5x 5G comes with a flagship-grade reinforced glass with 160 percent higher impact resistance compared to its predecessor. It has an I65-rated build and packs a 6,000mAh battery with 45W wired fast charging support.
title: Oppo A5x 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Reliance Jio has introduced new gaming-centric recharge packs for its prepaid subscribers in India. Offered across various price points, the newly announced plans are gaming add-ons which means they do not come with any voice call or SMS benefits and need an active base subscription to work. The telecom operator bundles a complimentary subscription to JioGames Cloud, enabling subscribers to stream high-quality gaming titles across the JioGames Android app, web browsers, and the JioFiber set-top box.
title: Reliance Jio Rolls Out Prepaid Gaming Plans With JioGames Cloud Access in India: Price, Benefits

description: Vercel, the company behind the vibe coding platform for web application development, v0, is now releasing an artificial intelligence (AI) model. Announced on Thursday, the v0 AI model is available via an application programming interface (API). It is the first AI model developed by the company, being shipped with the first API from them.
title: Vercel Releases v0 AI Model for Web Application Development, Compatible with OpenAI API

description: Xiaomi launched the Watch S4 15th Anniversary Edition in China on Thursday during the company's anniversary launch event. The new wearable, equipped with Xiaomi's in-house XRING T1 chipset, was unveiled alongside the Xiaomi 15s Pro and Xiaomi Pad 7 Ultra. The Watch S4 15th Anniversary Edition arrives a few months after the launch of the standard Watch S4.
title: Xiaomi Watch S4 15th Anniversary Edition Unveiled With XRING T1 Chipset

description: The DoJ is investigating if Google violated antitrust law in its agreement with Character.AI. Google last year signed a licensing deal with Character.AI that granted the search engine giant a non-exclusive license to the chatbot maker's large language model technology.
title: Google Said to Face DOJ Antitrust Probe Over Character.AI Deal

description: Lava Shark 5G was launched in India on Friday. The smartphone is powered by a 6nm octa-core Unisoc T765 chipset paired with 4GB of RAM. It supports an additional 4GB virtual RAM expansion as well. The handset carries a 50-megapixel dual rear camera setup with an LED flash alongside a 5-megapixel selfie shooter. The Lava Shark 5G comes with a 5,000mAh battery and is claimed to ship with clean Android 15 with no bloatware.
title: Lava Shark 5G With Unisoc T765 Chipset, 5,000mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Microsoft is testing several new artificial intelligence (AI) features for first-party apps in Windows 11. On Thursday, the Redmond-based tech giant announced that it is releasing a new update to Windows Insiders in the Canary and Dev channels. The update is only for those with a Copilot+ PC. The update includes new features for MS Paint, the Snipping Tool and the Notepad.
title: Microsoft Testing New AI Features in MS Paint, Snipping Tool and Notepad

description: Xiaomi Pad 7 Ultra has been launched in China alongside Xiaomi 15s Pro. The new Android tablet runs on Xiaomi's in-house 3nm 10-core XRING 01 chipset and boasts a 14-inch OLED display with 3.2K resolution and 3:2 aspect ratio. The Xiaomi Pad 7 Ultra has a 12,000mAh battery with 120W fast charging support.
title: Xiaomi Pad 7 Ultra With XRING 01 SoC, 12,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Xiaomi XRING O1 was unveiled Thursday on the Xiaomi 15S Pro, marking the company's first in-house chipset. Built on TSMC's advanced 3nm N3E process technology, the XRING O1 features a 10-core CPU, 6-core NPU, and 16-core GPU. A die shot of the XRING O1 reveals the layout of various components on the chipset.
title: Xiaomi XRING O1 Die Shot Reveals Details of 10-Core CPU, 6-Core NPU and More

description: Xiaomi YU7 was unveiled as the latest electric vehicle (EV) from the China-based company on Thursday. It arrives as an SUV challenger to the Tesla Model Y in China and joins Xiaomi’s growing fleet of electric cars which now has the Xiaomi SU7 sedan and its high-performance variant, the SU7 Ultra. Powering the EV is the proprietary Xiaomi Super Motor V6s Plus with 690 PS maximum horsepower which propels it to a 253 kilometres per hour (kmph) claimed top speed.
title: Xiaomi YU7 EV With 253 KMPH Claimed Top Speed and 835 KM CLTC Range Launched: All Details

description: Anthropic introduced Claude 4 artificial intelligence (AI) models at its inaugural developer conference on Thursday. The San Francisco-based AI firm unveiled Claude Opus 4 and Claude Sonnet 4 models, and announced new capabilities including Extended Thinking with tool use. Opus 4 is said to be state-of-the-art (SOTA) in coding, tool use, and writing.
title: Anthropic Releases Claude 4 Series AI Models With Improved Coding Capability and Tool Use

description: Apple is reportedly developing smart glasses that are expected to rival Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses. A Bloomberg report suggests a 2026-end launch for the Cupertino company's smart glasses. Apple's smart glasses are expected to be equipped with cameras, microphones for Siri integration, and a built-in speaker for additional functionalities.
title: Apple Smart Glasses Said to Arrive By 2026-End With Built-In Siri Support

description: Cetus Protocol said it approximately $223 million  (roughly Rs. 1,910 crore) in a security breach. The team is investigating the incident at the moment. The attacker exploited vulnerabilities in Cetus Protocol’s smart contracts, Deddy Lavid, CEO of blockchain security firm Cyvers.
title: Crypto DeFi Project Cetus Protocol Suffers Security Breach

description: The US FTC dropped a case that sought to block Microsoft's $69 billion purchase of "Call of Duty" maker Activision Blizzard. The FTC believed that pursuing the case against Microsoft was not in the public interest.
title: FTC Drops Case Over Microsoft's $69 Billion Activision Blizzard Deal

description: Sony is reportedly coming back with a games show case next month. The presentation is likely to be a State of Play broadcast rather than a full-length PlayStation Showcase. The last State of Play showcase took place in February, where the PlayStation parent revealed Saros, its first-party action game from Housemarque.
title: Sony Said to Be Planning PlayStation Event for June, Could Be State of Play

description: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro was launched in China on Thursday alongside the Xiaomi 15S Pro. The latest Civi model comes with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 chipset and a 6,000mAh battery with 67W wired fast charging support. It boasts a 1.5K micro-curved display with 1.6mm narrow, uniform bezels and a Leica-backed triple rear camera unit including a 50-megapixel main sensor. The Civi 5 Pro gets a 50-megapixel selfie shooter as well.
title: Xiaomi Civi 5 Pro With Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 SoC, 50-Megapixel Front Camera Launched

description: Honor 400 and Honor 400 Pro have been launched in select global markets on Thursday. The base Honor 400 runs on a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, while the Honor 400 Pro has a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset under the hood. The vanilla model has a 6.55-inch display, whereas the Honor 400 Pro gets a bigger 6.7-inch display. They flaunt 200-megapixel rear camera units and offer multiple AI-based features.
title: Honor 400, Honor 400 Pro With Snapdragon SoCs, 200-Megapixel Main Camera Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung’s Galaxy A26 packs a few upgrades over its predecessor, the Galaxy A25. There’s an IP67-rated design which appears slightly different and it offers a bigger display, which also means that the phone has grown larger in size. The chipset too is an upgrade, but again a minor one over the Galaxy A25. Things look fine on paper, but it all falls apart when it comes to execution.
title: Samsung Galaxy A26 Review: Keeping Up With the Times

description: Xiaomi 15S Pro was launched in China on Thursday. This is the first handset from the Chinese OEM to be equipped with its in-house 3nm 10-core XRING 01 chipset. It carries a Leica-backed 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit, including a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto shooter. The Xiaomi 15S pro packs a 6,100mAh battery with support for wired as well as wireless fast charging.
title: Xiaomi 15S Pro With In-House XRING 01 SoC, 6,100mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Following the acquisition of former Apple designer Jony Ive's artificial intelligence (AI) hardware startup io by Sam Altman’s OpenAI on Wednesday, information has surfaced about the AI device these two companies might be developing. As per an industry analyst, it is currently in a prototype phase with a size slightly larger than the failed Humane’s Ai Pin but it may still be as “elegant” as an iPod Shuffle. The device is slated to enter mass production in 2027.
title: Jony Ive and OpenAI to Launch AI Device With Cameras; Mass Production Slated for 2027

description: WhatsApp has introduced a new feature that makes it easier and more seamless to connect with others in group chats through live audio. The Meta-owned instant messaging client says users can now hop on a voice chat without having to leave the group or switch to a voice call. This feature was previously available only for large groups but has now been introduced for all group chats.
title: WhatsApp Rolls Out Voice Chat Feature for All Group Chats With End-to-End Encryption
